name: GamePlan
0:
”Alexa, ask Game Plan, what are my events?”
”Alexa, open Game Plan and tell me the Game Plan for John Smith?”
”Alexa, open Game Plan and ask John Smith what is the Game Plan?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game plan
des:
The Game Plan skill for Amazon Alexa allows you to interact with the Game Plan app by giving you the ability to check your or your friends' plans with just your voice. It also gives Alexa the power to ask your friends what the Game Plan is to spur them into action.

More on the Game Plan app:
No clue what to do tonight? With Game Plan, you can see what all your friends are up to at the touch of a button!

Hop onto a friend’s plans, or create your own! Keep it private, or get the party started and go public with your plan!

Chat with friends to quickly hash out the details, and create groups to send invites with ease!

Get reminders before your events begin, then execute your Game Plan!
